name: @builder.io/gpt-crawler
description: Crawl a site to generate knowledge files to create your own custom GPT

scripts.start:cli: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/src/cli.js
scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/src/main.js
scripts.start:server: NODE_ENV=development npm run build && node dist/src/server.js

author: It's not you it's me
